divs: Sighting DetailsWe were on the deck at home at about 9:39 pm July 4 2013 We were watching fireworks to the east and saw red orb cross the sky over head We thought it was strange They were redish and white glowing orbs that flew across the sky Thought they were strange Lost as they keep going north
Summary: Red orbs 6 or 7 flying south to north high in sky,I have video
